hero.title: SEO Studio
hero.titleHighlight: Inbound growth inside your Revenue OS
hero.subtitle: SEO Studio adds inbound marketing and technical SEO to Ori-OS, so keyword data, organic traffic, and content performance live in the same OS as your CRM, campaigns, workflows, and analytics.

sections.title: Why add SEO to your Revenue OS?
sections.subtitle: Most teams treat SEO as a separate universe. SEO Studio connects inbound signals to the same OS that runs your outbound and pipeline.
bullets: See inbound and outbound performance in one dashboard – organic clicks, rankings, email replies, meetings, and revenue.
Use SEO data directly in campaigns and workflows instead of copy-pasting from a separate tool.
Keep all growth work under the same security, RBAC, and audit logging as the rest of Ori-OS.

sections.title: One project for each domain you care about

columns.title: SEO projects linked to real accounts
columns.body: Create SEO projects for your own domain or for key clients, and link them to existing companies in your CRM so context never gets lost.
points: Track multiple domains or subdomains per organization.
Store crawl settings and Google Search Console connection details in one place.
Aggregate keywords, crawls, rankings, backlinks, competitors, and alerts per project.

columns.title: Google Search Console built-in
columns.body: Connect Google Search Console via OAuth and let Ori-OS sync queries, pages, clicks, impressions, CTR, and positions on a daily schedule.
points: Import keywords from real search data instead of guesswork.
Get traffic anomaly alerts when clicks drop beyond a chosen threshold.
Keep GSC tokens encrypted and access-controlled through existing security utilities.

columns.title: Discover and track the right topics
columns.body: Move from ad-hoc keyword lists to a structured keyword strategy that the whole team can see.
points: Discover keywords via Google Autocomplete, CSV import, or GSC sync.
Track daily positions and SERP features for target keywords.
Assign intent, difficulty, and target URLs so it's clear which page should rank for what.

columns.title: AI-powered clustering
columns.body: Group related keywords into topics so you plan content and campaigns around themes instead of single phrases.
points: Use clustering to design content hubs and pillar pages.
Report on performance at the topic level, not just per keyword.
Share clusters with campaign and content teams as a common roadmap.

sections.title: Technical SEO audits without leaving Ori-OS

columns.title: Site crawls tuned for B2B
columns.body: Run site audits that respect robots.txt and focus on issues that actually affect performance and trust.
points: Detect missing or duplicate titles and meta descriptions.
Find broken internal and external links, slow pages, and mobile issues.
Highlight weak heading structure, thin content, or missing schema where detectable.

columns.title: Prioritized, actionable issue lists
columns.body: See a clear breakdown of critical, warning, and informational issues instead of a wall of red icons.
points: Filter by severity and issue type to decide what to fix first.
Create tasks from issues and assign them to the right owner.
Track progress as issues are acknowledged, fixed, or ignored over time.

sections.title: Content analysis vs the real competition

columns.title: Compare your pages to the top 10
columns.body: Analyze key URLs against the current search results for your target keyword.
points: See how your word count, headings, images, and readability compare.
Identify likely content gaps and missing subtopics.
Use a simple 0-100 content score to summarize overall quality.

columns.title: Turn analysis into concrete recommendations
columns.body: Get AI-powered recommendations you can hand to writers, SEOs, or clients.
points: Generate prioritized to-do lists and content gap insights for each page.
Export or share analyses as part of your delivery to clients.
Link analyses to deals and campaigns so improvements are tied to revenue.

columns.title: Keep an eye on your link profile
columns.body: Monitor new and lost backlinks along with basic quality indicators.
points: Track when important links are gained or lost.
Flag potentially toxic domains for review.
See which content assets attract the most links over time.

columns.title: Watch what competitors publish
columns.body: Follow competitor domains to detect new content and shifts in their strategy.
points: See publishing patterns and content frequency.
Pull new competitor pages into your analysis workflows.
Trigger alerts or tasks when rivals publish on topics you care about.

sections.title: SEO data powering campaigns, CRM, and workflows

columns.title: Campaigns that match how people search
columns.body: Bring top-performing keywords straight into your email templates without leaving Ori-OS.
points: See high-CTR keywords from GSC next to your campaign editor.
Insert keywords into subject lines or body copy with one click.
Use keyword notes as hints for messaging and positioning.

columns.title: Workflows that react to SEO events
columns.body: Use SEO triggers and actions in Automation Studio so workflows respond automatically to ranking or technical changes.
points: Create tasks and Slack alerts when a tracked keyword drops or a critical issue appears.
Kick off content briefs when competitors publish on key topics.
Block risky campaigns that drive traffic to broken or severely affected pages.

sections.title: Unified analytics for inbound and outbound

columns.title: One dashboard for all growth activity
columns.body: Blend SEO metrics with your existing outbound and CRM data.
points: Track emails, replies, meetings, and pipeline value alongside organic clicks and impressions.
Monitor average position and number of keywords in top positions.
See total leads from outbound and organic in one place.

columns.title: Content that actually drives revenue
columns.body: Tie content performance to deals and closed-won revenue instead of just traffic.
points: Identify which blog posts and pages create the most pipeline.
Align sales, marketing, and RevOps around the same view of performance.
Justify SEO investments with revenue-linked KPIs, not vanity metrics.

sections.title: Security, RBAC, and compliance you already trust
sections.body: SEO Studio reuses Ori-OS security foundations instead of introducing a separate shadow system.
points: Encrypt GSC tokens and any sensitive credentials with the same utilities used elsewhere in Ori-OS.
Respect existing organization roles for SEO access (Owner, Admin, Manager, Operator, Viewer).
Log key SEO actions in audit trails and include SEO-related data in GDPR exports where relevant.

steps.title: Create your first SEO project
steps.description: Choose the domain you want to track, link it to an existing company if needed, and configure basics.

steps.title: Add keywords and run a crawl
steps.description: Import keywords from GSC or CSV, then start a site audit to establish your technical baseline.

steps.title: Plug SEO into your workflows
steps.description: Enable SEO widgets on dashboards, deals, and campaigns, then add one or two SEO-aware workflows.
